arts.ttl: Amorim ‘frustrated’ despite Man United win over Sunderland
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim admits it is “frustrating” that Man United can’t replicate their performances at Old Trafford when they play away after beating Sunderland on Saturday. Mason Mount opened his account for the season seven minutes after kickoff, before Benjamin Sesko doubled their lead on the half hour mark.
